sentences.sContent: Manufacturers are rubbing their hands with glee as they prepare to cash in.
sentences.sCn: 厂家准备收钱的时候高兴得直搓手。

remMethod.val: 和flee(v. 逃跑)一起记： 因flee(逃跑)而glee(欢喜， 高兴)

trans.tranOther: a feeling of satisfaction and excitement, often because something bad has happened to someone else
